posts.summary:
hey
 hey friend
 dont kill yourself tonight ok
 you have a really pretty smile and i know its not always easy to manage one but...
posts.body:
hey

hey friend

dont kill yourself tonight ok

you have a really pretty smile and i know its not always easy to manage one but itd be a bummer if we never had the chance to see it ever again

youre really important and you matter a lot so stay safe and try and have a nice sleep

posts.summary: Soo, let the trolling games begin
posts.title: Soo, let the trolling games begin
posts.body:
What should I get for my tattoo sleeve?

Best answer : Leonardo Di Caprio with a Oscar (by martinvonbember)

And few more, that are great :

an asphalt road, because if you’re asking a stranger this, then it’s safe to say you’re just gonna get run over your entire life. (by b1ggn)
n infinity symbol in Hogwarts shield and an anchor saying “will not sink”, with a bad portrait and some tribals. Done in your kitchen. (by laughinmagician)
Thank you for the answers!

posts.summary: Hate is not the answer
posts.title: Hate is not the answer
posts.body:
Talking about politics and future Olympic games in Russia

you don’t know the whole story
do not judge people by their government
every country have it’s own rules that may seem ridiculous & horrible for another. you can choose where to live
people can be bullied for no reason (just remember school days), really not based on skin color, weight and sexual preferences.
It’s easy to hate, but that’s not the way. Spead good things and people will hear you and maybe change their minds.

Sorry for posting this but this situation is just blowing my mind. Thank you. Peace, xxo

reblog.comment: Talking about politics and future Olympic games in Russia you don’t know the whole story do not judge people by their government every country have it’s own rules that may seem ridiculous & horrible for another. you can choose where to live people can be bullied for no reason (just remember school days), really not based on skin color, weight and sexual preferences. It’s easy to hate, but that’s not the way. Spead good things and people will hear you and maybe change their minds. Sorry for posting this but this situation is just blowing my mind. Thank you. Peace, xxo

It’s easy to hate, but that’s not the way. Spead good things and people will hear you and maybe change their minds. Sorry for posting this but this situation is just blowing my mind. Thank you. Peace, xxo

It’s easy to hate, but that’s not the way. Spead good things and people will hear you and maybe change their minds. Sorry for posting this but this situation is just blowing my mind. Thank you. posts.summary: A Sailor's Not A Sailor ('Til A Sailor's Been Tattooed)
posts.title: A Sailor's Not A Sailor ('Til A Sailor's Been Tattooed)
posts.body:
Song by Irving Berlin, 1954

We’ve got a date with gals and drink and food
Across the Brooklyn Bridge and to the Bow'ry
And I’m gonna get the kid tattooed
Tattooed?
Tattooed!
A sailor’s not a sailor ‘til a sailor’s been tattooed

Here’s an anchor from a tanker
That I sailed upon when first I went to sea
Here’s another of my mother
Takes me back to when I sat upon her knee

Here’s a crimson heart with a Cupid’s dart

Here’s a Battle Cruiser and when I sit down
On that, too
There’s a tattoo
Of my home town

To the Bow'ry
'Cross the Brooklyn Bridge and I’m just in the mood

He’ll be filled with diff'rent mixtures
And covered up with pictures

I can’t wait to be, 'twill be great to be tattooed

Tattooed?
Tattooed!
A sailor’s not a sailor 'til a sailor’s been tattooed

Tattooed! A sailor’s not a sailor 'til a sailor’s been tattooed

posts.summary: Script tattoo ideas
posts.title: Script tattoo ideas
posts.body:
A friend is never known till needed.
Life is not a bed of roses.
A broken friendship may be soldered, but will never be sound.
Into each life some rain must fall.
Judge not of men and things at first sight.
No man is wise at all times.
Never do things by halves. (Never half-ass two things, whole-ass one thing.© Ron Swanson)
One man’s meat is another man’s poison.
Repentance is good, but innocence is better.
Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
No news is good news.
Not to know is bad, not to wish to know is worse.
No man loves his fetters, be they made of gold. 
Soon learnt, soon forgotten.
Speak fair and think what you like.
Hell is paved with good intentions. 
Cowards die many times before their deaths.
No one is a fool always, every one sometimes.
Better safe than sorry.
  Better late than never.
Behind every great man there’s a great woman.
Bitter truth is better than a sweet lie.
Curiosity killed the cat.
Tomorrow never comes.
All’s fair in love and war.
Actions speak louder than words.
Fool me once, shame on you; fool me twice, shame on me.
Pride goes before a fall
Find fonts at dafont.com (free)

Script tattoos http://tattoome.tumblr.com/tagged/script
